serializedexecution

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • serializedexecution.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Database manages the SQLite database. In particular it makes available all the necessary methods to perform the different kinds of query to the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database(java.lang.String path)

      Close the connection to the SQLite database.
      void connectionValidator() 
      java.util.ArrayList<Model> getClickedModels(FileType fileType)
      Retrieves the models contained in the database in the table indicated by "fileType" if the database field "CHECKED" evaluates "1".
      static java.lang.String getTableName(FileType fileType)
      The method getTableName() is static and offers a way to obtain the table name in the database given a specific FileType "fileType".
      void insertConfigurationValues(java.lang.String id, java.util.ArrayList<NumericElement> value)
      Executes an "insert" query to store the numeric values related to a configuration with id "id".
      void insertIntoTable(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String path, FileType fileType)
      Performs an "insert" query into the table relative to the FileType "fileType", in order to insert the element with name "name" and located at path "path".
      boolean removeFromTable(java.lang.String name, FileType fileType)
      Perform a "delete" query in order to remove the element named "name" from the table of the corresponding "fileType".
      java.util.ArrayList<NumericElement> retrieveConfigurationValues(java.lang.String configurationId)
      Get all the numeric values that have belong to a configuration with id "configuration_id".
      java.util.ArrayList<Model> retrieveFromTable(FileType fileType)
      Perform a "select" query to the database in order to extract the models contained in the table relative to the FileType "fileType".
      void updateClicked(java.lang.String selectedName, int clicked, FileType fileType)
      Performs an update query in order to Set the value of the database field "CHECKED" to "clicked".

        java.lang.Exception

      • insertIntoTable

        public void insertIntoTable(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String path,
                            FileType fileType)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs an "insert" query into the table relative to the FileType "fileType", in order to insert the element with name "name" and located at path "path". Value of "path" has a double meaning: it is the file path in case of fileType != FileType.CONFIGURATION else "path" is replaced by the id of the selected EC id.
        Parameters:
        name -
        path -
        fileType -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • removeFromTable

        public boolean removeFromTable(java.lang.String name,
                               FileType fileType)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform a "delete" query in order to remove the element named "name" from the table of the corresponding "fileType". If we delete a configuration, we want to remove all the values connected to that specific configuration (both parameters and variables). If we delete an External Classifier we want to remove all the configuration which have as EC_ID the id of the deleted EC.
        Parameters:
        name -
        fileType -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getTableName

        public static java.lang.String getTableName(FileType fileType)
        The method getTableName() is static and offers a way to obtain the table name in the database given a specific FileType "fileType".
        Parameters:
        fileType -
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • updateClicked

        public void updateClicked(java.lang.String selectedName,
                          int clicked,
                          FileType fileType)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs an update query in order to Set the value of the database field "CHECKED" to "clicked". The table is indicated by the "fileType".
        Parameters:

        clicked -

        public java.util.ArrayList<Model> getClickedModels(FileType fileType)

        Retrieves the models contained in the database in the table indicated by "fileType" if the database field "CHECKED" evaluates "1".

      • retrieveConfigurationValues

        public java.util.ArrayList<NumericElement> retrieveConfigurationValues(java.lang.String configurationId)
                                                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get all the numeric values that have belong to a configuration with id "configuration_id". For each extracted value the method understands if it is a parameter or a variable and decides what class to instantiate (i.e. "Parameter" or "Variable"). To decide what kind of value has been retrieved we use a simple way: If the "step" is a negative number, then a parameter has been retrieved, else, the retrieved element is a variable.
        Parameters:
        configurationId -
        Returns:
        ArrayList
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        java.sql.SQLException

      • insertConfigurationValues

        public void insertConfigurationValues(java.lang.String id,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<NumericElement> value)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes an "insert" query to store the numeric values related to a configuration with id "id". The numeric values are contained in the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        id -
        value -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
